segment.source: This topic provides a list of links to help you learn about Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) 2.5, its purpose, features, recommended architecture, and steps for evaluating MBAM in a test environment.
segment.target: This topic provides a list of links to help you learn about Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) 2.5, its purpose, features, recommended architecture, and steps for evaluating MBAM in a test environment.

segment.source: See the following resources for additional MBAM documentation:
segment.target: See the following resources for additional MBAM documentation:

segment.source: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring Deployment Guide
segment.target: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring Deployment Guide

segment.source: Before you deploy MBAM to a production environment, we recommend that you validate your deployment plan in a test environment.
segment.target: Before you deploy MBAM to a production environment, we recommend that you validate your deployment plan in a test environment.

segment.source: Before you start planning your MBAM deployment, review the following topics.
segment.target: Before you start planning your MBAM deployment, review the following topics.

segment.source: High-level overview of MBAM 2.5 that describes how you can use it in your organization.
segment.target: High-level overview of MBAM 2.5 that describes how you can use it in your organization.

segment.source: Release notes, which lists known issues in the product.
segment.target: Release notes, which lists known issues in the product.

segment.source: Information about how you can evaluate MBAM 2.5 in a test environment.
segment.target: Information about how you can evaluate MBAM 2.5 in a test environment.

segment.source: Evaluating MBAM 2.5 in a Test Environment
segment.target: Evaluating MBAM 2.5 in a Test Environment

segment.source: Description of the MBAM 2.5 features and the recommended architecture of the Stand-alone and Configuration Manager Integration topologies in a production environment.
segment.target: Description of the MBAM 2.5 features and the recommended architecture of the Stand-alone and Configuration Manager Integration topologies in a production environment.

segment.source: Description and illustration of each MBAM Server feature, without the recommended architecture.
segment.target: Description and illustration of each MBAM Server feature, without the recommended architecture.

segment.source: Illustrated Features of an MBAM 2.5 Deployment
segment.target: Illustrated Features of an MBAM 2.5 Deployment

segment.source: Describes the keyboard shortcuts that are available for MBAM 2.5.
segment.target: Describes the keyboard shortcuts that are available for MBAM 2.5.

segment.source: MBAM 2.5 is a part of the Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack (MDOP).
segment.target: MBAM 2.5 is a part of the Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack (MDOP).

segment.source: MDOP is part of Microsoft Software Assurance.
segment.target: MDOP is part of Microsoft Software Assurance.

segment.source: For more information about Microsoft Software Assurance and about acquiring MDOP, see How Do I Get MDOP (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=322049).
segment.target: For more information about Microsoft Software Assurance and about acquiring MDOP, see How Do I Get MDOP (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=322049).

segment.target: Add or vote on suggestions here.

segment.source: For MBAM issues, use the MBAM TechNet Forum.
segment.target: For MBAM issues, use the MBAM TechNet Forum.
